tasks.description: Add comprehensive unit tests covering login, logout, and token refresh flows

tasks.title: Add dark mode support
tasks.description: Implement theme toggling between light and dark modes across the app

tasks.title: Create user profile page
tasks.description: Build a page where users can view and edit their profile information

tasks.title: Implement search functionality
tasks.description: Add full-text search across tasks with debounced input

tasks.title: Optimize bundle size
tasks.description: Analyze webpack bundle and reduce overall JS payload by lazy loading routes

tasks.description: Integrate Sentry for frontend error tracking and alerting

tasks.title: Create onboarding tour
tasks.description: Build an interactive walkthrough for new users on first login

tasks.title: Add email notifications
tasks.description: Send email alerts when tasks are assigned or due dates approach

tasks.title: Implement drag-and-drop reorder within column
tasks.description: Allow users to reorder tasks within the same column via drag and drop

tasks.title: Build REST API for task CRUD
tasks.description: Create Express endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting tasks

tasks.title: Add form validation
tasks.description: Validate all task form fields before submission with user-friendly error messages

tasks.title: Implement pagination for task list
tasks.description: Add server-side pagination to handle large numbers of tasks efficiently

tasks.title: Style task cards with priority colors
tasks.description: Apply visual indicators on task cards based on their priority level

tasks.title: Integrate date picker component
tasks.description: Replace plain text date input with a proper date picker for due dates

tasks.title: Add loading skeletons
tasks.description: Show skeleton placeholders while tasks are being fetched from the server

tasks.title: Refactor state management
tasks.description: Migrate from prop drilling to React Query for server state management

tasks.title: Fix task deletion not updating UI
tasks.description: Deleting a task removes it from the server but the UI does not refresh

tasks.title: Resolve CORS issue on staging
tasks.description: API calls from the frontend are blocked by CORS policy on the staging server

tasks.title: Fix drag-and-drop on mobile
tasks.description: Drag and drop does not work on touch devices due to pointer event handling

tasks.title: Database migration stuck
tasks.description: PostgreSQL migration fails on the shared dev database, blocking schema changes

tasks.title: Third-party API rate limit hit
tasks.description: External notification service rate limits are causing delivery failures

tasks.title: Waiting for design assets
tasks.description: Cannot proceed with the dashboard redesign until new icons and illustrations arrive

tasks.title: SSL certificate expired on dev server
tasks.description: HTTPS connections to the dev environment are failing due to an expired cert

tasks.title: Fix flaky integration tests
tasks.description: Several integration tests fail intermittently due to race conditions

tasks.description: Initialize Git repo, add README, and configure branch protection rules

tasks.description: Build the four-column Kanban board layout with responsive grid

tasks.description: Build a modal dialog for creating new tasks with title, description, and priority

tasks.description: Wire up API calls from React to json-server for persistent task storage

tasks.title: Implement task editing
tasks.description: Allow users to click a task card to open the edit dialog with pre-filled data

tasks.title: Add task delete confirmation
tasks.description: Show a confirmation prompt before permanently deleting a task

tasks.title: Implement cross-column drag and drop
tasks.description: Enable moving tasks between columns using dnd-kit with smooth animations

tasks.title: Add responsive header
tasks.description: Create the app header with logo, search bar, and task count

tasks.title: Write API documentation
tasks.description: Document all json-server endpoints with request and response examples

tasks.title: Add keyboard shortcuts
tasks.description: Implement keyboard shortcuts for common actions like creating and deleting tasks

tasks.description: Allow users to export all tasks as a CSV file for reporting purposes
